metadata.Title: STEMP
metadata.Institution: The University of Georgia, Griffin, Georgia; University of Florida, Gainesville, Florida; Iowa State University, Ames, Iowa; International Center for Soil Fertility and Agricultural Development, Muscle Shoals, Alabama; University of Guelph, Guelph, Ontario
metadata.Extended description: Computes daily soil temperature by layer using an EPIC/Partonâ€“Logan based approach. It updates surface and layer temperatures from bulk density, soil water, albedo, latitude, and annual mean/amplitude, using a damping depth that responds to soil physical conditions.
